name: Wordpress HabitRPG Badge
tagline: A widget-badge for HabitRPG specially made to be displayed in Wordpress pages, original code by pipcorona
body:
### Welcome

This badge is built on code originally put together by @pipcorona. I've tweaked it a bit so that it's ready to be dropped into a Wordpress directory, and so that it will play nice with most Themes. 

I'm still in the process of building a plugin, but this is the behind the scenes way of getting this to work. 

#What this code will get you:

By following the [tutorial I wrote on my blog](http://wp.me/p24kb8-17L), simply type `<?php include 'get-character.php' ?>` anywhere inside a Page or Post on your Wordpress installation and the following Badge will show up!

![Badge](http://gersande.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/HABITRPG_stuff61.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
